title: Quinoa and tuna salad
ingredients: ['85g uncooked quinoa', '250ml water', '4 tablespoons chopped celery', '4 tablespoons chopped onion', '4 tablespoons light mayonnaise', '1 teaspoon wasabi powder', '2 teaspoons lemon juice or to taste', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 (185g) tin tuna, drained']
